org.infinispan.client.hotrod.configuration.Configuration

    • addRemoteCache

      public RemoteCacheConfiguration addRemoteCache(String name, Consumer<RemoteCacheConfigurationBuilder> builderConsumer)
      Create a new RemoteCacheConfiguration. This can be used to create additional configurations after a RemoteCacheManager has been initialized.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the cache configuration to create
      builderConsumer - a Consumer which receives a RemoteCacheConfigurationBuilder and can apply the necessary configurations on it.
      Returns:
      the RemoteCacheConfiguration
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if a cache configuration with the same name already exists

    • removeRemoteCache

      public void removeRemoteCache(String name)
      Remove a RemoteCacheConfiguration from this Configuration. If the cache configuration doesn't exist, this method has no effect.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the RemoteCacheConfiguration to remove.

    • statistics

      public StatisticsConfiguration statistics()

      public long transactionTimeout()
      see ConfigurationBuilder.transactionTimeout(long, TimeUnit),

      public TransportFactory transportFactory()

    • tracingPropagationEnabled

      public boolean tracingPropagationEnabled()
      OpenTelemetry tracing propagation will be activated if this property is true and if the OpenTelemetry API jar is detected on the classpath. By default, the property is true.
      Returns:
      if the tracing propagation is enabled

    • metricRegistry

      public RemoteCacheManagerMetricsRegistry metricRegistry()
      Returns:
      The RemoteCacheManagerMetricsRegistry implementation to use for metrics.

    • serverFailureTimeout

      public int serverFailureTimeout()
      Controls how long a server is marked as failed in milliseconds. Default is 30_000 milliseconds or 30 seconds.
      Returns:
      time in milliseconds

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
